item.title: Unilever sales just miss expectations; Ben & Jerry's ice cream unit heads for triple listing
item.description: Consumer goods giant Unilever posted slightly weaker-than-expected sales growth and pointed to a "slower start to 2025."

item.title: Germany's second-largest lender Commerzbank to cut 3,900 jobs as it unveils new targets
item.description: Commerzbank announced it will eliminate 3,900 full-time positions by 2028, largely in its native Germany, as it unveiled a spate of new strategic targ...

item.title: Barclays shares sink 5% as fourth-quarter profit hike and 2025 guidance fail to impress
item.description: British bank Barclays posted a rise in full-year pre-tax profit that came in just ahead of analyst expectations, while also launching a Â£1 billion sha...

item.title: Sony raises full-year forecasts after solid PlayStation 5 sales in the holidays
item.description: The December quarter is a key period for Sony, covering the holiday shopping season which is often a lucrative time for consumer electronics firms.

item.title: Reddit shares plunge after Google algorithm change contributes to miss in user numbers
item.description: Reddit reported better-than-expected results, but the company issued disappointing user numbers.
